SmartFieldSpec.Name: Last Terminated Sponsorship Has Reason of Auto Cancelled Sponsorship Date (Only Financial Sponsors)
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Sponsorship End Date of those where the last terminated or cancelled sponsorship has a reason of 'Autocancel - Delinquent Payment'
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SmartFieldSpec.DisplayName: Last Terminated Sponsorship Has Reason of Auto Cancelled Sponsorship Date (Only Financial Sponsors)
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_LASTESTAUTOCANCELLEDSPONSORSHIPDATE ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date with CancellationReasons as ( select ft.CONSTITUENTID, sp.ENDDATE, sp.[REASON] as ENDSPONSORSHIPREASON
from dbo.USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION as sp_ext join dbo.V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIP as sp on sp_ext.ID = sp.ID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on sp.REVENUESPLITID = rs.ID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.ID = rs.REVENUEID join dbo.V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY as so on sp_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID left outer join dbo.V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPTRANSACTION as sp_trans on sp.[ID] = sp_trans.CONTEXTSPONSORSHIPID
where so.[TYPE] = N'Child' and ( sp_trans.[ACTION] in (N'Terminate', N'Cancel') and sp_trans.ISLASTTRANSACTION = 1 and ((sp_trans.REASON not in (N'Account Correction', N'User Correction')) or sp_trans.REASON is null or sp_trans.REASON = '') ) and sp_ext.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUS in (N'Formerly Sponsored', N'Formerly Unpaid Sponsored')
) select distinct c1.CONSTITUENTID, C1.ENDDATE from CancellationReasons c1 where ENDDATE = (select max (ENDDATE) from CancellationReasons c2 where c1.CONSTITUENTID = c2.CONSTITUENTID) and ENDSPONSORSHIPREASON = 'Autocancel - Delinquent Payment'
